lenders.name: Johann
lenders.loan_because:
I hope my support will help others make a better life for themselves and their families.
J'espère que mon prêt aidera d'autres personnes à se construire un meilleur avenir.

lenders.name: Moira
lenders.loan_because: I have always considered myself fortunate, and I believe in sharing fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a recent college graduate.  I work for a business consulting company.

lenders.name: MartinCSI
lenders.loan_because: We have profits from our own business and believe everyone should have an opportunity to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: We design and program electrical control systems for the manufacturing industry in the United States.

lenders.name: Andres
lenders.loan_because: It is a noble way to contribute to the revitalization of small businesses in a global economy and promotes the development of entrepreneurs who have the passion for running a business but lack the funds to take it to the next level.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing management professional with an interest in global economies and the development of the small business sector.

lenders.name: US College Search
lenders.loan_because: Our desire is to see people make a fresh start in life, to continue in the success they have had and achieve their long term dreams. We want to be a lender on this site to extend our mission to people around the world and make a difference in places it’s really needed.
lenders.occupational_info: The U.S. College Search group strives to be a quality resource for high school students, parents and anyone looking to go back to college. Our database contains thousands of 4-year universities, 2-year colleges, junior colleges, vocational schools, job training programs, technical certification programs and online degree programs.

lenders.name: Manjula
lenders.loan_because: The stories are so touching.

lenders.name: Beauty School
lenders.loan_because: We love to aid people in taking care of themselves and others through skin and hair care training. In the same way we desire to assist people through this website to take care of their needs and the needs of others in their care. What a great site this is!
lenders.occupational_info: BeautySchool.com is the Internet's only comprehensive directory of Licensed Beauty Schools and Colleges from all over the world. We connect people with the right training to get them on the way to a thriving career in the beauty industry.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I know that being an entrepreneur is hard work and it's nice to have a little help. I am moved by those who have the courage to take control of their lives and rise above poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people build community and learn about self-sufficient and sustainable living.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: it is a sustainable and constructive way of helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I work developing electronic systems that make automotive engines work

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I feel very lucky that as a business person who has grown up in America with many opportunities, that I help others make their lives better.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can. I have been blessed with many things in my life and want to share my blessings.

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: God leads me to help others.

lenders.name: Terrisa

I believe that the world will change if everyone could just "pay it forward"
compassion heals everything. 
"Love thy neighbor as thyself" That is the whole meaning of the Torah, Bible...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a part time Real Estate Broker but a full time Admin/Office Manager. I take care of all the paper work involved in a transaction. I am Married with 5 children. I live in Dundee, Oregon.

lenders.occupational_info: I help biotechnology companies bring new products to market.

lenders.name: Daniel

lenders.occupational_info: I work in tourism helping people experience the world in a respectful, thoughtful way.

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.occupational_info: I test computer software to make sure it works and to see if I can break it.

lenders.name: devon
lenders.loan_because: i think it is one way to make the world a better place.  it doesn't take much to change the life of someone - and many people - across the world and have a lasting impact with kiva.  it is a reliable, easy, and informative micro-credit loan process between the lenders, the local chapters, and the entrepreneurs needing loans to expand or improve their businesses.

lenders.name: Rob (Sybre & Juna)
lenders.loan_because:
- People matter. People know best what is best for them. Microcredit directly helps people and not governments or other organizations.

- My children should learn how they should both respect and help other people. This is a great way to involve them.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant on water management and regional governmental issues.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: It sounds like a great way to make a big difference in someone's life for the price of going to a movie.  I hope it'll also turn into a fun hobby as I track and reinvest my loans.  I also hope I get to see the how these loans help people succeed and improve the lives of their families and everyone else in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I help government communicate clearly and openly with citizens.  The better citizens understand what governments do with their money, the better they'll be able to hold those same governments to account.

lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: real estate development

lenders.occupational_info: I'm semi retired but voluteer with a non-profit org.and write for fun

lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of three; my twin sons are doctoral students in chemistry and my daughter is an undergraduate in chemistry and plans to go to medical school to become an emergency  and disaster relief surgeon. She will travel to Ghana this January as a volunteer for Unite for Sight.  I teach reading and writing to 2nd and 3rd grade bilingual students.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
What goes around comes around; people have helped me, and it is something I always remember, now it is my turn. The world needs more kindness.

 “Give, and it shall be given to you. For whatever measure you deal out to others, it will be dealt to you in return.” 

“Charity shall cover the multitude of sins”
(i like bible quotes, :)   )

adapted from The Star Thrower
by Loren Eiseley (1907 - 1977)

Once upon a time, there was a wise man who used to go to the ocean to do his writing. He had a habit of walking on the beach before he began his work.

One day, as he was walking along the shore, he looked down the beach and saw a human figure moving like a dancer. He smiled to himself at the thought of someone who would dance to the day, and so, he walked faster to catch up.

As he got closer, he noticed that the figure was that of a young man, and that what he was doing was not dancing at all. The young man was reaching down to the shore, picking up small objects, and throwing them into the ocean.

He came closer still and called out "Good morning! May I ask what it is that you are doing?"

The young man paused, looked up, and replied "Throwing starfish into the ocean."

"I must ask, then, why are you throwing starfish into the ocean?" asked the somewhat startled wise man.

To this, the young man replied, "The sun is up and the tide is going out. If I don't throw them in, they'll die."

Upon hearing this, the wise man commented, "But, young man, do you not realize that there are miles and miles of beach and there are starfish all along every mile? You can't possibly make a difference!"

At this, the young man bent down, picked up yet another starfish, and threw it into the ocean. As it met the water, he said, "It made a difference for that one."

lenders.occupational_info:
U.S. Census Bureau
Technical Assistance and Capacity Building
International Assistance Area

In this position, I work on reimbursable projects in developing countries, which directly contributes to the Census Bureau's core mission, “sharing our expertise globally.” This is accomplished by providing technical assistance and training to build statistical capacity worldwide.  As a result of this effort many countries now have data to use for critical policy making decisions.

*Project Lead: Interagency Census Coordination
Project lead for the Interagency Census Coordination Committee meetings, which provides a forum for technical assistance agencies such as the United Nations Population Fund and the U.S. Agency for International Development. I am responsible for implementing future committee meetings, tentatively scheduled for 2008, which bring international donor organizations together for coordinating efforts in ensuring that developing countries have a successful round of 2010 censuses.

*Marketing Coordinator: International Assistance Area
Tasked with creating a series of informational literature to distribute among potential sponsors, host countries, and other technical assistance agencies to highlight the importance of taking censuses and using census data for policy making decisions.
 
*Geographic Information Systems Expert: Sudan Census Project
Assisting the Southern Sudanese government by providing Geographic Information System expertise to develop maps for use in the upcoming census of Sudan.  These are the first maps for this area of the country and are necessary to ensure an accurate count of the country’s population.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because:
I greatly admire Kiva.org - I think it's one of the most powerful tools that have come from the information age.  Fully utilizing the extensive reach of the internet, Kiva.org has the ability to monetarily connect anyone in the world to a small business in an impoverished country.  

While a $800 loan to a small business may seem inadequate here in America, to a small business in a destitute country, it could be the difference as to whether they can afford medicine or food for their family.  It could be all the difference to their employee's and their family.  It could also be all the difference to their community.  

The greater and long term impact of helping a small business grow reaches far beyond the the business itself.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a co-founder of an internet marketing company called CPAlead.com.  We provide unique and innovative online marketing tools to small and big website owners from all over the world.  

These ad display tools generate our clients revenues much greater than traditional online marketing networks.  We have helped over 150,000 people monetize their website's and as a result we were recently ranked the #1 fastest growing online marketing start-up by INC 500 magazine.  

To learn more about CPAlead, please visit http://www.youtube.com/cpalead
